channel.description: The top News headlines from The Sydney Morning Herald. For all the news, visit https://www.smh.com.au
channel.title: Sydney Morning Herald - Latest News

item.description: The news of the day as interpreted by our talented artists, illustrators and cartoonists.
item.title: Best of cartoons, June 17, 2020

item.description: Some of his best work
item.title: The latest illustrations from artist Andrew Dyson

item.dc:creator: Mike Foley
item.description: Damage to underground water resources from the controversial Shenhua Watermark coal mine may be far worse than forecasts endorsed by the NSW government.
item.title: Shenhua coal mine questioned over 'disturbing' water report omissions

item.description: The latest work by Sydney Morning Herald editorial cartoonist Cathy Wilcox.
item.title: The latest illustrations from artist Cathy Wilcox

item.description: Illustrations by the artist from The Age.
item.title: The latest illustrations from artist Matt Golding

item.description: South Australia's police chief has rejected suggestions of systemic racism in the force after video footage emerged of an Aboriginal man being pinned down and hit by officers in Adelaide.
item.title: Inquiry launched into Aboriginal man struck by South Australian police in video

item.description: No surprise that the flat Earth is a bit narrower than the real one.
item.title: Feeling grumpy? Blame it on your liver

item.dc:creator: Adrian Proszenko
item.description: Players face the prospect of spending 10 minutes in the sin bin if they are guilty of a "deterioration in discipline" regarding the new rules.
item.title: NRL warns of sin-binnings if new rules aren't obeyed

item.description: Brandon Smith usually comes off the bench and bounces around an NRL game like a pinball but the Melbourne ace is learning to manage his time as a starting prop.
item.title: Brandon Smith relishing Storm starting prop role

item.dc:creator: Sally Rawsthorne
item.description: Regan Cash was last seen at a home at Penshurst on Monday morning.
item.title: Fifteen-year-old missing from Sydney's south

item.dc:creator: Michael Chammas
item.description: Isaac Moses has had his accreditation cancelled after advising Tim Mannah to give 'false evidence' during the Parramatta Eels salary-cap investigations.
item.title: Players can terminate contracts after NRL bans top agent Isaac Moses

item.dc:creator: Jake Niall
item.description: Carlton have identified a lack of tackling early in the games as one of the common threads in their poor starts this season.
item.title: Tackling the Blues' problem

item.dc:creator: Peter Ryan
item.description: The AFL has confirmed Amazon's docu-series will air in 2021 involving players Eddie Betts, Nic Naitanui, Rory Sloane, Stephen Conglio, Richmond president Peggy O'Neal and Gold Coast coach Stuart Dew
item.title: Amazon series on AFL stars to air in 2021

item.dc:creator: Lucy Stone
item.description: The council has kept quiet about any rate hikes, changes to fees or cuts to services in the upcoming budget.
item.title: Brisbane council's coronavirus-hit budget to be released on Wednesday

item.dc:creator: Jocelyn Garcia
item.description: CSIRO's Data61 shows when Queenslanders felt a high intensity of emotions throughout the past five years.
item.title: Bushfires, COVID-19 fears and travel ban anger: How Queensland sees 2020

item.dc:creator: Royce Millar
item.description: A $380m marina scheme in Gippsland that was fronted by allegedly corrupt planning consultant John Woodman will probably be jettisoned by Bass Coast Shire.
item.title: Council set to reject $380m Gippsland marina linked to John Woodman

item.dc:creator: Tammy Mills
item.description: The US Chamber Institute for Legal Reform says its members are exposed to litigation in what it calls a plaintiff-friendly country.
item.title: Powerful US business lobbyist enters Australia's class action debate

item.dc:creator: Vince Rugari
item.description: Lance Franklin says his admiration for women and mothers has gone "through the roof" after spending lockdown with his wife and newborn daughter.
item.title: 'It was perfect': Buddy opens up on life as a father in lockdown

item.dc:creator: Adrian Proszenko
item.description: When Cronulla CEO Dino Mezzatesta was first asked about supposed interest in Eddie Jones taking over as coach, he had no idea who the England rugby mentor was.
item.title: 'Eddie who?': Sharks ridicule Jones takeover talk and back John Morris

item.dc:creator: Latika Bourke
item.description: Crossbench MPs have called for the Department of Agriculture to be stripped of its role as the regulator of the live export trade.
item.title: Summer ban on live exports a 'sham' after Federal Court ruling, MPs say

item.description: The Indian army said senior military officials from both sides were meeting to calm the situation.
item.title: India says officer, two soldiers killed in 'violent face-off' on border with China

item.dc:creator: Lisa Visentin
item.description: Greens MLC David Shoebridge has declared he will not sack a staffer who was charged with defacing a statue of Captain Cook.
item.title: Shoebridge stands by staffer accused of Cook statue vandalism

item.dc:creator: Daniel Cherny
item.description: The AFL tribunal has upheld West Coast gun Jeremy McGovern’s one-match suspension, meaning the defender will miss his side’s meeting with the Brisbane Lions at the Gabba on Saturday night.
item.title: McGovern suspension upheld

item.dc:creator: Anthony Galloway
item.description: Foreign Minister Marise Payne has hit out at China and Russia for deliberately spreading disinformation during the coronavirus pandemic.
item.title: Foreign Minister Marise Payne hits out at Chinese, Russian 'disinformation'

item.description: The finest photos from the international wire agencies as chosen by our picture editors.
item.title: The best of the world in pictures

item.dc:creator: Alice Clarke
item.description: The collaboration between two heavyweight kids brands has produced a brilliant and imaginative real-world Nintendo game for all ages.
item.title: It's-a-me, Lego Mario: the ultimate '90s kids brand collaboration

item.dc:creator: Daniel Cherny
item.description: The Sydney Swans are aiming to become possibly the first sporting club in Australia to return to hosting five-figure crowds since the COVID-19 crisis escalated in March.
item.title: Swans want 10,000 at SCG in round five

item.dc:creator: Tony Wright
item.description: For the first time, the Speaker of the House of Representatives and the President of the Senate can eyeball each other as they preside over their chambers.
item.title: Order! A pandemic forces the doors to democracy to swing open

item.dc:creator: Georgina Mitchell
item.description: Ali Khorami is facing trial in the NSW District Court accused of indecently assaulting female patients at a Sydney sleep clinic.
item.title: Sydney GP faces court over indecently assaulting patients

item.dc:creator: Nick Toscano
item.description: Australian mining giant Fortescue has brought forward a target to slash greenhouse gas emissions, pledging its operations will be carbon-neutral by 2040.
item.title: Forrest's Fortescue brings forward net zero emissions pledge by 10 years

item.dc:creator: Jordan Baker
item.description: The NSW Teachers Federation has called for a year 12 catch-up package, involving 10 extra hours of teaching in each HSC subject, in each school.
item.title: Teachers union wants government to provide extra lessons for year 12

item.dc:creator: Genevieve Rota
item.description: While audiences seem to be flocking to Big Brother, it hasn't arrived on TV screens without drama.
item.title: Does Big Brother have a big problem with diversity?

item.dc:creator: Nick Toscano
item.description: Viva Energy has unveiled plans to transform its troubled Geelong oil refinery into an 'energy hub', with an LNG import terminal and solar farm on the agenda.
item.title: Viva spruiks job, energy gains as it floats Geelong refinery overhaul

item.dc:creator: Chris Barrett
item.description: Kevin Roberts is gone but senior figures in Australian cricket believe the CA board must also be held accountable for the game's winter of discontent.
item.title: Board revamp on cards at Cricket Australia as Roberts' exit fails to appease states

item.dc:creator: Caroline Wilson
item.description: The AFL has offloaded a prime piece of central Melbourne real estate, originally earmarked for the redevelopment around Marvel Stadium, for an estimated $60 million.
item.title: AFL offloads Docklands real estate for $60 million

item.dc:creator: Nick Bonyhady
item.description: Business owners who underpay workers in Victoria risk being prosecuted twice for the same offence once the Andrews government criminalises wage theft, experts say.
item.title: Victorian wage theft laws raise double jeopardy risk for businesses

item.dc:creator: Ella Archibald-Binge
item.description: An Aboriginal teenager is suing for damages after he was allegedly struck in the head by police in an incident caught on video last year.
item.title: Aboriginal teen sues after alleged NSW police assault caught on video

item.dc:creator: Christian Nicolussi
item.description: James Tedesco continued to receive praise from teammates, opposition players and even the local Tigers-loving butcher after his Monday night masterclass
item.title: Raising the steaks: 'Hunger back' for refreshed Tedesco after lockdown

item.dc:creator: Miki Perkins
item.description: The sea floor around Rye Pier has been littered with disintegrating chicken carcasses and plastic rubbish, dropped by crowds of people fishing for migratory giant spider crabs.
item.title: Hunt for nature's bounty turns Rye Pier into a 'chicken cemetery'

item.dc:creator: Rob Harris
item.description: Federal Labor will decide all state and federal candidates from the Victorian Labor party for three years due to a branch stacking scandal.
item.title: Daniel Andrews asked federal Labor to take over Victorian preselections

item.dc:creator: Zoe Samios
item.description: As TikTok unveils its newly established Australian leadership team, one expert remains concerned about how the Chinese-owned platform uses consumer data.
item.title: Data security, censorship concerns flagged as TikTok opens local office

item.dc:creator: Rachael Dexter
item.description: A sixteen-year old boy has died from stab wounds after a brawl at a Melbourne shopping centre on Tuesday afternoon.
item.title: Teenage boy dead after brawl in Deer Park

item.dc:creator: Greg Baum
item.description: Cricket Australia decides that Kevin Roberts, after less than two years as chief executive, is not the man to pull Australian cricket together again.
item.title: Roberts finds himself run out

item.dc:creator: The Herald's View
item.description: This is not a Victorian ALP problem. It is a national problem that needs a national solution.
item.title: Victorian scandal shows need for federal ICAC

item.dc:creator: Noel Towell
item.description: Three ex-ministers at the centre of the branch-stacking scandal locked out of their parliamentary offices as IBAC investigators go to Adem Somyurek's home.
item.title: Dumped ministers locked out of offices as IBAC pays Somyurek a visit

item.dc:creator: Lucy Battersby
item.description: The S&P/ASX200 has ended Tuesday's session nearly entirely in green, as central bank stimulus around the world boosted equity markets.
item.title: ASX swells by $66 billion as central banks open vaults

item.description: L'Cosmo has been listed for next month's Magic Millions Broodmare Sale and, while she's finished in the top three 11 times from 14 starts, only one was a win.
item.title: Snowden wants a feel for future form of for-sale filly L'Cosmo

item.description: We've got you covered with everything you need to know for a seven-race card.
item.title: Race-by-race tips and preview for Warwick Farm on Wednesday

item.dc:creator: Daniel Cherny
item.description: A seven-round VFL men’s season is set to commence on August 1 but the 2020 VFLW season has been cancelled.
item.title: VFL revamped, VFLW season substituted with new series

item.dc:creator: David Crowe
item.description: Negotiations on a national integrity commission will restart after crossbenchers said Victorian Labor powerbroker Adem Somyurek's fall revealed issues to be addressed.
item.title: Push for national integrity commission to restart after Somyurek fall
